post: Looking for specific ule Lads decorations

comment.body: We saw these at the Christmas store on Laugavegur. May have also been at some of the bigger Icewear stores as well.

You could try to contact the Christmas store on Laugavegur. Maybe they could help.

https://jolabudin.is

These are widely available downtown. 
Icewear, Viking, Islandia..
